original_text: For no prophecy was ever produced by the will of man, but men spoke from God as they were carried along by the Holy Spirit.
korean_text: 예언은 언제든지 사람의 뜻으로 낸 것이 아니요 오직 성령의 감동하심을 받은 사람들이 하나님께 받아 말한 것임이라

sentences.original_text: For no prophecy was ever produced by the will of man
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 어떤 예언도 사람의 뜻으로 생긴 것이 아닙니다.

sentences.original_text: as they were carried along by the Holy Spirit.
